name: Imbuement of Lightning
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
The touched melee weapon becomes imbued with electricity. The next successful weapon attack with that weapon over its duration deals an additional 1d6 lightning damage and removes 1 AP from the target until the start of their next turn.

Casting this spell on a weapon ends any other spells affecting that weapon.
empower: Range becomes Self (5 foot radius), targeting any number of melee weapons you choose.
